home.title: Welcome to FormVault
home.subtitle: Complete your insurance application securely and efficiently

features.secureDesc: Your data is protected with industry-standard encryption
features.multilingualDesc: Available in English, Chinese, and Spanish
features.mobileDesc: Complete your application on any device

personalInfo.title: Personal Information
personalInfo.subtitle: Please provide your personal details for the insurance application

fileUpload.title: Upload Documents
fileUpload.subtitle: Please upload your required documents
fileUpload.instructions: Upload clear, high-quality images or PDFs of your documents. Maximum file size is 5MB per file.
fileUpload.allFilesUploaded: All required files have been uploaded successfully!

review.title: Review Your Application
review.subtitle: Please review your information before proceeding
review.incompleteWarning: Your application is incomplete. Please complete the missing sections:
review.personalInfoIncomplete: Please complete your personal information before proceeding.
review.fileNotUploaded: This file has not been uploaded yet.
review.readyToProceed: Your application is complete and ready for submission!

confirmation.title: Confirm Submission
confirmation.subtitle: Please review and confirm your application submission
confirmation.incompleteWarning: Your application cannot be submitted because it is incomplete:
confirmation.submissionNotice: By submitting this application, you confirm that all information provided is accurate and complete. Once submitted, you will receive a confirmation email with your reference number.

success.title: Application Submitted!
success.subtitle: Your insurance application has been successfully submitted
success.referenceNumberNote: Please save this reference number for your records

nextSteps.title: What happens next?
nextSteps.emailConfirmationNote: You will receive a confirmation email within 5 minutes
nextSteps.processingNote: Your application will be reviewed within 2-3 business days
nextSteps.followUpNote: We will contact you if additional information is needed

success.importantInfo: Important: Please keep your reference number safe. You will need it for any future correspondence regarding this application.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.subtitle: The page you're looking for doesn't exist

personalInfo.title: Personal Information
personalInfo.subtitle: Please provide your personal details for your insurance application

firstName.minLength: First name must be at least 2 characters
firstName.pattern: First name can only contain letters, spaces, hyphens, and apostrophes

lastName.minLength: Last name must be at least 2 characters
lastName.pattern: Last name can only contain letters, spaces, hyphens, and apostrophes

email.pattern: Please enter a valid email address

phone.pattern: Please enter a valid phone number

dateOfBirth.future: Date of birth cannot be in the future
dateOfBirth.minAge: You must be at least 18 years old
dateOfBirth.maxAge: Please enter a valid date of birth

street.minLength: Street address must be at least 5 characters

city.minLength: City must be at least 2 characters
city.pattern: City can only contain letters, spaces, hyphens, and apostrophes

state.minLength: State/Province must be at least 2 characters

zipCode.pattern: Please enter a valid ZIP/Postal code

studentId.label: Student ID
studentId.description: Upload a clear photo or scan of your student ID card

passport.label: Passport
passport.description: Upload a clear photo or scan of your passport

fileUpload.title: Document Upload
fileUpload.description: Please upload your required documents. You can upload either a student ID or passport, or both.
fileUpload.dragAndDrop: Drag and drop your file here
fileUpload.orClickToSelect: or click to select a file
fileUpload.requirements: Supported formats: JPEG, PNG, PDF. Maximum file size: 5MB per file.

errors.title: Please fix the following errors:
errors.fileTooLarge: File is too large. Maximum size is {{maxSize}}MB
errors.noFilesUploaded: Please upload at least one document
errors.submitFailed: Failed to submit files. Please try again.

navigation.unsavedChanges: You have unsaved changes. Don't forget to save your progress.

errors.general: An error occurred. Please try again.
errors.network: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.validation: Please check your input and try again.
